metadata.title: CVE-2017-15128 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in the hugetlb_mcopy_atomic_pte function in mm/hugetlb.cin the Linux kernel before 4.13.12. A lack of size check could cause adenial of service (BUG).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15128` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.13.0-25-generic - 4.13.0-25.29
linux-image-4.13.0-25-generic-lpae - 4.13.0-25.29
linux-image-4.13.0-25-lowlatency - 4.13.0-25.29
linux-image-extra-4.13.0-25-generic - 4.13.0-25.29
No subscription required

linux-image-4.13.0-1008-raspi2 - 4.13.0-1008.8
No subscription required
